item.description:
Hello Fellow Portuguese Meet-Uppers,

Sam Ray, a professional dance teacher from Brazil (www.samray.com), has volunteered to lead a free introductory Brazilian dance Meet-up.

The goal to introduce Samba no Pe and Forro dance steps.
Depending on time and interest, he would also be willing to cover basic steps of Samba de Gafiera.

To practice your Portuguese skills, he plans to conduct the class in Portuguese and if necessary, he can translate instructions into English.


******The dance class will be in Studio 4*********

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: BRAZILIAN DANCE FREESTYLE with Sam Ray.
